name: Our Fate Forsaken - Yaoi BL Visual Novel
name_original: Our Fate Forsaken - Yaoi BL Visual Novel
description:
After his death, Zeph became an angel, but he has no recollection of his time as a human. In the afterlife, he meets Archangel Gabriel, who is oddly possessive of him. One day, Zeph decides to visit Earth and encounters a human named Asa, with who he feels a strange connection.

Gabriel used to be his guardian angel, and Asa is still his soulmate. It's no wonder the two are strangely fond of him. Maybe too fond of him...








DISCLAIMER! Mentions the afterlife, suicide, and death (No depictions)
- SFW
- 35K words
- 7 Endings
- 17 CGs




Credits to Dova Syndrome for background music and music used for the trailer.
Credits to Zapsplat for sound effects.
